entry.title: Funerary fragment from Odeon
entry.summary: White marble fragment without edges (0.39 × 0.10 × 0.18). Inscribed on the surviving face. Date: Second to third centuries A.D. (lettering). Photo. Recorded by the NYU expedition (Odeon 21). Unpublished.
